item.title: By: V∆∞·ª£ng

item.description: Hehe, it is time for docker I guess. Just try to install it for the first time. Not really difficulty at all but a bundle of advantageous features. Highly recommended.
item.content:encoded: Hehe, it is time for docker I guess. Just try to install it for the first time. Not really difficulty at all but a bundle of advantageous features. Highly recommended.

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description: Did a Test with https too http://bit.ly/2rycy5m have fun with it same results and no timeout and page wasnt cached at first if 3k user hit php 7 it simply uses full ram and crash the mysql but not hhvm
item.content:encoded: Did a Test with https too http://bit.ly/2rycy5m have fun with it same results and no timeout and page wasnt cached at first if 3k user hit php 7 it simply uses full ram and crash the mysql but not hhvm

item.title: By: bibica
item.dc:creator: bibica
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://static.bibica.net/easyengine/#comment-252">John</a>.
Hmm, I see you have many redirects, maybe you used protocol https, and when tested you use protocol http? (https://imgur.com/8K3IjYa)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to John.

Hmm, I see you have many redirects, maybe you used protocol https, and when tested you use protocol http? (https://imgur.com/8K3IjYa)

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description: @bibica Lol did a test with 1500 The avg client around 2000 and 2 timeout and can handle alot more https://ldr.io/2KQ4PZi with just 30 % cpu usage Memory usage 400 mb which ideal with 10k post around 15 Plugin
item.content:encoded: @bibica Lol did a test with 1500 The avg client around 2000 and 2 timeout and can handle alot more https://ldr.io/2KQ4PZi with just 30 % cpu usage Memory usage 400 mb which ideal with 10k post around 15 Plugin

item.title: By: bibica
item.dc:creator: bibica
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://static.bibica.net/easyengine/#comment-250">John</a>.
You can try my setting for tested (https://imgur.com/vSKk1Ss), maybe 1000 or 2000 clients over 1 min
With WP Rocket and Rocket-Nginx you can pass 2000 client / s with VPS 1 GB RAM (https://static.bibica.net/easyengine-vs-centmin-mod-vs-runcloud-vs-webinoly/)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to John.

You can try my setting for tested (https://imgur.com/vSKk1Ss), maybe 1000 or 2000 clients over 1 min

With WP Rocket and Rocket-Nginx you can pass 2000 client / s with VPS 1 GB RAM (https://static.bibica.net/easyengine-vs-centmin-mod-vs-runcloud-vs-webinoly/)

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description: How to enable swap? and does it increase performance and if you have time please try Hhvm with wpfc and memcache enable it can handle more than 1500 active user without any issue here an test with hhvm https://ldr.io/2G1JN6g using 5$ digital ocean server
item.content:encoded:
How to enable swap? and does it increase performance and if you have time please try Hhvm with wpfc and memcache enable it can handle more than 1500 active user without any issue
here an test with hhvm https://ldr.io/2G1JN6g using 5$ digital ocean server
